subject: Rivers
Safaris
Canoes and Canoeing
lead_paragraph: The obstacles on the course of the water safari include snakes and hornets, rapids and portages, the Texas sun. Serious contenders expect to lose their fingernails.
snippet: The obstacles on the course of the water safari include snakes and hornets, rapids and portages, the Texas sun. Serious contenders expect to lose their fingernails.
